"1. Back up the data and check its backup path.
2. Connect the phone to a PC and open its directory.
3. Copy the backup file from the backup path onto the PC.
4. Connect the new phone to the PC and open its directory.
5. Copy the backup file into any directory on the new phone.
6. Open Backup & Restore on the new phone, then select the backup file to start restoring."

"1. Insert an SD card into this phone.
2. Back up the data.
3. Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device.
4. Open Backup & Restore on the new phone, then select the backup file to start restoring."
